commands.description: Toggle PvP Zones around the entered monument. Using '1' at the end of the command activates the zone. Using '0' at the end deactivates the zone.
Clears all active PvP Zones on the map. Sets every monument killzone to 0.
Lists all active PvP Zones in the console.
